slides.title: Your Year as a Creator
slides.content: From podcasts to product demos, you spent the year sharing bright ideas and building the future.

slides.title: Opening Scene
slides.content: Your year kicked off after midnight in March, diving deep into tech entrepreneurship and setting a focused, ambitious tone for the months ahead.

slides.title: Your Best Moments
slides.content: You captured 93 videos this year. Here are a few that told your story.

slides.title: What You Captured Most
slides.content: Interviews & Podcasts: 60%, Product Demos: 25%, Promotional Content: 15%

slides.title: Your Most Filmed Items
slides.content: Your world was framed by a familiar sight: a potted plant appeared over 10,000 times, becoming the silent co-host to your many tech conversations.

slides.title: Objects That Told Your Story
slides.content: Your story unfolded from the comfort of a couch, with laptops and cell phones as your tools. It was a year of building and sharing from your creative command center, always with a touch of green in the background.

slides.title: Your Filming Habits
slides.content:
Busiest Month: May was your creative peak.
Favorite Season: You filmed the most during Spring.
Total Runtime: You recorded over 562 minutes of footage.
Marathon Session: Your longest video was a deep 84-minute conversation.

slides.title: Your Weekend Personality
slides.content: You're a Weekend Creator. With 40% of your filming happening on weekends, you used your free time to dive into your passion projects and share your knowledge with the world.

slides.title: Day of the Week Energy
slides.content: Tuesday was your powerhouse day. More than any other, Tuesdays were for hitting 'record' and bringing new ideas to life.

slides.title: Where You Filmed
slides.content: You spent most of the year creating from one consistent space, your hub for interviews and demos. But you also captured a unique moment on the road in Kenitra, Morocco.

slides.title: Color Temperature
slides.content: Your videos have an earthy and focused feel, dominated by palettes of Dark Olive Green, black, and gray. This creates a professional, intimate mood perfect for deep conversations.

slides.title: Your Cinematic Moodboard
slides.content: Focused conversations • On-screen code • Greenery in the background • Late-night insights • The soft glow of a monitor

slides.title: Your Creative DNA
slides.content: You are a Tech Storyteller. Your visual identity is clear and consistent: thoughtful, conversation-driven content that aims to educate and connect with others in the digital space.

slides.title: Your Vibe Score
slides.content: 72/100. While your videos are calm and focused, your vibe score is high due to the immense intellectual curiosity and consistent creative energy you brought to every recording.

slides.title: Words You Used Most
slides.content: Shopify, app, code, developer, waitlist, build, podcast, data, Laravel, React

slides.title: Snapshot of the Year
slides.content: The defining image of your year is a split-screen interview: two people connecting over technology, sharing ideas from their own spaces, unified by a passion for building something new.

slides.title: Closing Scene
slides.content: Your year's story closed on a Tuesday evening in August with another deep conversation, ending the year just as it began: driven by curiosity and a passion for sharing knowledge.

slides.title: Share Your Story
slides.content: Your year was one for the books. Share your creative journey with the world!

topScenes.description: A conversation with Wes Bos about building a career in web development.
